caption: Related Attribute
description: The Related Attribute object provides a reference to another attribute in an event or finding.
name: related_attribute

event_uid.description: The unique identifier of the event/finding containing the related attribute. If the event/finding is in OCSF, then this value must be equal to metadata.uid in the corresponding event/finding. If left unspecified, it indicates the referenced event/finding is the root object.

json_path.description: The JSON path of the related attribute in the event/finding matching event_uid. For example: evidences[2].device.network_interfaces[0].ip
